SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#cloud-config
          hostname: VSCodeServer
          runcmd:
            - mkdir -p /Workshop && chown -R participant:participant /Workshop

rules_to_suppress.reason: For this tmp instance we do not need an asg
For this tmp distribution we do not need geo restrictions
For this tmp distribution we do not need waf integration
For this tmp distribution we do not need access logging enabled
For this tmp distribution we do not need limit SSL protocols as we use the default viewer cert
For this tmp distribution we do not need limit SSL protocols as we use the default viewer cert

runCommand: apt-get -q update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q apt-utils
apt-get -q update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q needrestart unattended-upgrades
echo "Apt helper packages added. Checking configuration"

apt-get -q update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q curl gnupg whois argon2 unzip nginx openssl locales locales-all apt-transport-https ca-certificates software-properties-common

if [[ "participant" == "ubuntu" ]]
then
  echo 'Using existing user: participant'
else
  echo 'Adding user: participant'
  adduser --disabled-password --gecos '' participant
  echo "participant:{{ VSCodePassword }}" | chpasswd
  usermod -aG sudo participant
fi
apt-get -q update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q git
sudo -u participant git config --global user.name "Workshop Participant"

if [[ -z "{{ RepoUrl }}" ]]
then
  echo "No Repo"
else
  mkdir -p /Workshop && chown -R participant:participant /Workshop
  sudo -u participant git clone {{ RepoUrl }} /Workshop
  echo "Repo {{ RepoUrl }} cloned. Checking configuration"
  ls -la /Workshop
  sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop remote -v
fi

if [[ -z "{{ AssetZipS3Path }}" ]]
then
  echo "No assets"
else
  mkdir -p /Workshop && chown -R participant:participant /Workshop
  mkdir -p /tmp
  aws s3 cp s3://{{ AssetZipS3Path }} /tmp/asset.zip
  chown -R participant:participant /tmp/asset.zip
  unzip -o /tmp/asset.zip -d /Workshop
  chown -R participant:participant /Workshop
  if  [[ -d /Workshop/.git ]]
  then
    sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop add .
    sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop commit -m 'chore: workshop commit'
  else
    sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop init
    sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop add .
    sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop commit -m 'chore: initial commit'
  fi
  echo "Assets downloaded. Checking configuration: /Workshop"
  ls -la /Workshop
  sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop branch
fi

if [[ -z "{{ FolderZipS3Path }}" ]]
then
  echo "No folders"
else
  rm -rf /tmp/folder
  mkdir -p /tmp/folder && chown -R participant:participant /tmp/folder
  aws s3 cp s3://{{ FolderZipS3Path }} /tmp/asset-folder.zip
  chown -R participant:participant /tmp/asset-folder.zip
  unzip -o /tmp/asset-folder.zip -d /tmp/folder
  chown -R participant:participant /tmp/folder
  mkdir -p /Workshop && chown -R participant:participant /Workshop
  cd "/Workshop" && cd ..
  if [[ $(pwd) ==  "/" ]]
  then
    targetRootFolder=""
  else
    targetRootFolder=$(pwd)
    chown -R participant:participant .
  fi
  find "/tmp/folder" -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | while read sourceFolder; do
    folder="$(basename $sourceFolder)"
    echo "Processing folder: $folder"
    targetFolder=$targetRootFolder/$folder
    if [[ $targetRootFolder == "" ]]
    then
      mv $sourceFolder /
    else
      mv $sourceFolder $targetRootFolder
    fi
    chown -R participant:participant $targetFolder
    sudo -u participant git -C $targetFolder init
    sudo -u participant git -C $targetFolder add .
    sudo -u participant git -C $targetFolder commit -m "chore: initial commit"
    echo "Folder downloaded. Checking configuration: $targetFolder"
    ls -la $targetFolder
  done
  rm -rf /tmp/folder
fi

if [[ -z "{{ BranchZipS3Path }}" ]]
then
  echo "No branches"
else
  rm -rf /tmp/branch
  rm -rf /tmp/git
  mkdir -p /tmp/branch && chown -R participant:participant /tmp/branch
  mkdir -p /tmp/git && chown -R participant:participant /tmp/git
  aws s3 cp s3://{{ BranchZipS3Path }} /tmp/asset-branch.zip
  chown -R participant:participant /tmp/asset-branch.zip
  unzip -o /tmp/asset-branch.zip -d /tmp/branch
  chown -R participant:participant /tmp/branch
  mkdir -p /Workshop && chown -R participant:participant /Workshop
  sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop init
  mv /Workshop/.git /tmp/git
  rm -rf /Workshop
  mkdir -p /Workshop && chown -R participant:participant /Workshop
  mv /tmp/git/.git /Workshop
  find /tmp/branch -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | while read sourceFolder; do
    branch="$(basename $sourceFolder)"
    echo "Processing branch: $branch"
    sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop checkout -b $branch 2>&1
    cp -a $sourceFolder/. /Workshop
    sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop add .
    sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop commit -m "chore: initial commit $branch"
    mv /Workshop/.git /tmp/git
    rm -rf /Workshop
    mkdir /Workshop && chown -R participant:participant /Workshop
    mv /tmp/git/.git /Workshop
  done
  sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop checkout main 2>&1
  sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop restore .
  rm -rf /tmp/branch
  rm -rf /tmp/git
  echo "Branches downloaded. Checking configuration: /Workshop"
  sudo -u participant git -C /Workshop branch
  ls -la /Workshop
fi

tee /home/participant/.config/code-server/config.yaml <<EOF
cert: false
auth: password
hashed-password: "$(echo -n {{ VSCodePassword }} | argon2 $(openssl rand -base64 12) -e)"
EOF
apt-get -q update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q nodejs
echo "Node and npm installed. Checking configuration"

if uv generate-shell-completion bash &>/dev/null; then
  echo 'eval "$(uv generate-shell-completion bash)"' >> /home/participant/.bashrc
fi

if uvx generate-shell-completion bash &>/dev/null; then
  echo 'eval "$(uvx generate-shell-completion bash)"' >> /home/participant/.bashrc
fi
apt-get -q update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q python3-pip python3-venv python3-boto3 python3-pytest

if [ -f /home/participant/.local/share/code-server/User/settings.json ]; then
  sed -i "2i\\  \"python.testing.pytestEnabled\": true," /home/participant/.local/share/code-server/User/settings.json
else
  echo '{
    "python.testing.pytestEnabled": true
  }' > /home/participant/.local/share/code-server/User/settings.json
fi
echo "Python and Pip installed. Checking configuration"
DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q java-21-amazon-corretto-jdk java-17-amazon-corretto-jdk java-1.8.0-amazon-corretto-jdk maven
echo "Java and Maven installed. Checking configuration"
apt-get -q update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q dotnet-sdk-8.0
apt-get -q update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
apt-get -q update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -q golang
